lyrics:
25 contributorstranslationstiếng việtwildfire lyricsverse 1

chasing down the hourglass
running from my past
headed out with no direction no direction
kerosene beauty queen
looking for her matchstick king to burn in to my heart
hand in to the flame
we could set the world ablaze cause

chorus
baby you’re all i need
come now set me free
like a wildfire like a wildfire

melt with your scarlet kiss

verse 2

waiting for the moon to rise

rip me like your torn up jeans
i don’t even care
you can take me there
you can set my world ablaze cause
you might also likechorus

where every single notes too hard
i don’t even care
you can take me there
